rows: Extends any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

Find a slot for the meeting with needed people within the company. Simplifies scheduling by automatically checking availability and proposing suitable time slots. Ensures smooth coordination across different time zones, avoiding scheduling conflicts. Saves time by automating meeting logistics, allowing users to focus on high-value tasks.Can improve scheduling efficiency, meeting attendance rate, and time spent on meeting coordination KPIs.
Generates an email to Contact or Account based on your query and opens the email page. Significantly enhances the daily workflow of any employee required to send a large number of emails.

Rephrases any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
Provides ability to search and work with data based on user query. Greatly enhances the workflow of any employee by providing advanced search capabilities that can be used in Creatio.ai immediately.

Shortens any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs

Translates any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
Enriches account data by searching for them online with Bing. Requires Bing Search API key. Enables marketers and sales teams to get a complete view of an account as quickly as possible.

Generates a summary based on meeting minutes. Provides clear and concise summaries of meetings by highlighting key points and action items. Saves time by eliminating the need to manually sift through lengthy transcripts. Improves team alignment and follow-through on decisions and tasks.Can improve the meeting productivity, action item completion rate, and team alignment and communication KPIs.
Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Detects existing contacts based on email participants and shows recent history. Suggests creating new contacts if none are found. Streamlines contact acquisition and profile enrichment, directly enhancing CRM data integrity. The system's automation capabilities reduce manual input overhead significantly, maintaining up-to-date records while minimizing manual data entry.
Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Generates a summary of the full email thread. Enables instant comprehension of thread context and essential decisions, bypassing the need for time-consuming reads. This capability translates to substantial time savings and accelerated decision-making directly. Potential KPI improvements include decision-making cycle time, information retrieval efficiency, and cross-functional understanding.
Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Drafts a context-aware email response using the email thread and Creatio data. Delivers instant, consistent responses to common inquiries, powered by personalization from CRM data. This capability slashes response times and standardizes communication, ensuring every customer interaction is on-brand. It can boost customer loyalty, support efficiency, agent morale, and NPS (Net Promoter Score) KPIs.
html:
Name

App

Description and use cases

Mode

Version

Extend text

Creatio Studio

Extends any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Formal text rewrite

Friendly text rewrite

New meeting

Creatio Studio

Find a slot for the meeting with needed people within the company. Simplifies scheduling by automatically checking availability and proposing suitable time slots. Ensures smooth coordination across different time zones, avoiding scheduling conflicts. Saves time by automating meeting logistics, allowing users to focus on high-value tasks.

Can improve scheduling efficiency, meeting attendance rate, and time spent on meeting coordination KPIs.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Prepare an email

Creatio Studio

Generates an email to Contact or Account based on your query and opens the email page. Significantly enhances the daily workflow of any employee required to send a large number of emails.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Creatio Studio

Rephrases any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Search data

Creatio Studio

Provides ability to search and work with data based on user query. Greatly enhances the workflow of any employee by providing advanced search capabilities that can be used in Creatio.ai immediately.

8.2 Energy and later

Creatio Studio

Shortens any rich text. Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs

Creatio Studio

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

Chat

Enrich account data

Customer 360

Enriches account data by searching for them online with Bing. Requires Bing Search API key. Enables marketers and sales teams to get a complete view of an account as quickly as possible.

API

8.2.1 Energy and later

Summarize activity

Productivity

Generates a summary based on meeting minutes. Provides clear and concise summaries of meetings by highlighting key points and action items. Saves time by eliminating the need to manually sift through lengthy transcripts. Improves team alignment and follow-through on decisions and tasks.

Can improve the meeting productivity, action item completion rate, and team alignment and communication KPIs.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Identify contacts

Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Detects existing contacts based on email participants and shows recent history. Suggests creating new contacts if none are found. Streamlines contact acquisition and profile enrichment, directly enhancing CRM data integrity. The system's automation capabilities reduce manual input overhead significantly, maintaining up-to-date records while minimizing manual data entry.

Chat

8.3 Twin and later

Summarize email

Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Generates a summary of the full email thread. Enables instant comprehension of thread context and essential decisions, bypassing the need for time-consuming reads. This capability translates to substantial time savings and accelerated decision-making directly. Potential KPI improvements include decision-making cycle time, information retrieval efficiency, and cross-functional understanding.

Chat

8.3 Twin and later

Reply to email

Productivity + Creatio.ai for Outlook, both are required

Drafts a context-aware email response using the email thread and Creatio data. Delivers instant, consistent responses to common inquiries, powered by personalization from CRM data. This capability slashes response times and standardizes communication, ensuring every customer interaction is on-brand. It can boost customer loyalty, support efficiency, agent morale, and NPS (Net Promoter Score) KPIs.
